basics.name: Kosal Chansothay
basics.summary: 5th year Data Science student at the Institute of Technology of Cambodia with expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Data Analytics. Experienced in fine-tuning LLMs, building predictive models, and creating data-driven solutions.

location.address: St 1980, Phnom Penh Thmey, Sen Sok

work.company: Institute of Digital Research and Innovation (IDRI), CADT
work.summary: Fine-tuned Qwen3 4B-parameter model using LoRA and 4-bit quantization. Processed tax-related Q&A dataset (1,690 pairs) from GDT website. Deployed model with minimal resources (Tesla T4 on Colab).
highlights: Fine-tuned Qwen3 4B-parameter LLM using Low Rank Adaptation
Processed 1,690 Q&A pairs from PDF documents

work.company: Ministry of Post and Telecommunications, CADT
work.summary: Worked on Khmer Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) project. Used ffmpeg framework in Python for video processing and performed text segmentation for model training.
highlights: Video processing using ffmpeg in Python
Text segmentation for Khmer ASR model training

references.name: Mr. Touch Sopheak

portfolio.name: Khmer Sentiment Analysis
portfolio.description: Deep learning project using Transformer architecture for Khmer language sentiment analysis. Includes literature review on attention mechanisms and GPT backbone.

portfolio.name: Customer Churn Prediction
portfolio.description: Classification model using Logistic Regression with Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Scikit-learn for data preprocessing and model building.

portfolio.name: YOLOv8 Object Detection
portfolio.description: Object detection and localization project using YOLOv8. Includes pre-trained model training, evaluation, and literature review on mathematical foundations.

portfolio.name: Caffeine Effects on Academic Performance
portfolio.description: Research on coffee consumption effects on university students' performance using R Programming and exploratory data analysis.
